trans-unit.source: Defines a brush of a single color.
Brushes are used to fill graphics shapes, such as rectangles, ellipses, pies, polygons, and paths.
trans-unit.target: 筆刷是用來填滿圖形形狀，例如矩形、橢圓形、派形、多邊形和路徑。

trans-unit.source: This class inherits from the <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> class.
The following code example adds a shadow to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> using a <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將陰影<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>使用<xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush>。

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste this code into a form and call the `AddShadow` method when handling the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，將此程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`AddShadow`方法時處理表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件。

trans-unit.source: Make sure the form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> named `listBox1`.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that represents the color of this brush.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，表示這個筆刷的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SolidBrush" /> object of the specified color.
trans-unit.target: 初始化指定色彩的新 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SolidBrush" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a shadow to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> using a <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將陰影<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>使用<xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush>。

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste this code into a form and call the `AddShadow` method when handling the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，將此程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`AddShadow`方法時處理表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件。

trans-unit.source: Make sure the form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> named `listBox1`.
Creates an exact copy of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SolidBrush" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SolidBrush" /> 物件的完全相同複本。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SolidBrush" /> object that this method creates.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法建立的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SolidBrush" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SolidBrush" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SolidBrush" /> 物件的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that represents the color of this brush.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構，表示這個筆刷的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Drawing.SolidBrush.Color" /> property is set on an immutable <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SolidBrush" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Drawing.SolidBrush.Color" /> 屬性是在不可變動的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SolidBrush" /> 上設定。
